name: Paws & Claws: Pampered Pets
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Only the Best for Your Pets!



Luxury and extravagance are the way of life at the Paws & Claws Pampered Pets Spa. Let the pampering begin!

  • Time for TLC! Welcome your clients to your Paws & Claws Pet Spa to style and spoil your pets as you become the star of the industry.
  • Bling! Create custom jeweled collars with the finest of emerald, quartz and topaz stones in your very own Pet Spa Shop.
  • Posh pad! Welcome your VIPets to their very own luxurious themed rooms including the Pretty in Purple, You're a Movie Star, Big Toy, Outer Space, Outdoor Adventure, Ahoy Matey and Ultimate Royalty rooms.
  • Cute as can be! Care for 8 adorable different animals including 6 dogs and 2 cats breeds.
  • Star Treatments! Keep tabs of your client's favorite pampering treatments to be sure they leave with a smile one their face.
